urls.title: Welcome! You are invited to join a webinar: Water Use Outside the Home. After registering, you will receive a confirmation email about joining the webinar.
urls.description: A Waterwise webinar in partnership with Watersafe. In the water sector we often talk about PCC - per capita consumption to describe ho much water we use per person per day, but this only accounts for the water our home water meter measures, it leaves out the water we use when we are outside of the house. To coincide with us all being able to leave the house more as lockdown restrictions lift, this year, Water Saving Week is focusing on the water we use once we have left our front door. In this webinar we will be looking specifically at why businesses should prioritise saving water and why as individuals we should also be thinking about saving water when we are out and about as well as at home.
